Title: The Remains of the Day
Actors: John Haycraft, Christopher Reeve, Anthony Hopkins, Emma Thompson
Plot: A rule bound head butler's world of manners and decorum in the household he maintains is tested by the arrival of a housekeeper who falls in love with him in post-WWII Britain. The possibility of romance and his master's cultivation of ties with the Nazi cause challenge his carefully maintained veneer of servitude.
Awards: Nominated for 8 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 23 nominations.
